title: MOON [Noel McCalla] 2 Albums [70s Funky Soul Classic Rock] Vinyl
description:
Can&#039;t find any real info on this band.  They featured Noel McCalla on lead vocals who went on to play in Partners In Crime and did vocals on one track on Trevor Rabin&#039;s "Wolf" album.  They were signed to Epic and just released these two albums as far as I know.  I would put them in the same vein as Crawler, soulful classic rock.  I know Gary Moberley was credited as playing keyboards on one of the albums, maybe both.  He played keyboards for Sweet in the late 70s/early 80s.  I don&#039;t think he was a member of the band.  Anyway, if you know Moon you don&#039;t need me to give you all the info.  If you don&#039;t, hope you have better luck finding stuff on them on the net than me.

I have ripped these from vinyl but tidied up the overall sound with a bit of editing.  I have tried to do this as gently as possible.  Hope you enjoy the results.
